## Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you would like to see.

## Use Case

For example:
- "I frequently need to ... and currently there is no way to ..."
- "When working with large workspaces, it would be helpful to ..."

## Proposed Solution

Describe your preferred solution. How do you envision this feature working?

- What would the user interaction look like?
- What keybindings would you suggest (if applicable)?
- How would it integrate with existing features?

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you have considered.
